Class UnixDomainSocket

java.lang.Object
java.net.Socket
org.springframework.boot.buildpack.platform.socket.UnixDomainSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public final class UnixDomainSocket extends Socket
A Socket implementation for Unix domain sockets.
Since:
3.4.0
Author:
Scott Frederick
